title: Borrow and lending service
body:
Hi dear pancakers!

This is a **WIN-WIN** plan for all pancakers.
in this way a person(who wants loan) can **borrow** some coin or usdt from a pool that other people made it.
the the **amount** **of** **loan** is about 50% to 75% of his staked cake.
when he borrows it his fund will be **locked** or **freezed** in pancake so if the value of freezed fund goes **less** than the loan his fund will be sold.


 ***borrower*** ***Adjectives***
 
1. he can borrow some if he doesn't want to move his fund to use on other investment 
*   in red situations can use it to make profit
*   even can be used in real life
 
 ***all*** ***pancakers*** ***Adjectives***
 1. can save the  huge profit of this pool
 2. other crypto traders will stake cake if they need it so the cake price can move on 
 3. a small percentage of fund can be burned
author: 0x1af7978463784446505f9711f031ABD26D9381A3
